In 2019, Convergences and Gawad Kalinga joined forces to co-create the “Barangay Walang Iwanan 2019” event that took place in the Philippines in January 2019.

More than 300 attendees participated in the exchanges with the speakers and organisations in the Asian Institute of Management on January 17 2019. The Convergences Forum was followed by learning expeditions in Metro Manila and 2 days of summit at Gawad Kalinga’s Enchanted Farm.

excerpt.rendered: In 2019, Convergences and Gawad Kalinga joined forces to co-create the “Barangay Walang Iwanan 2019” event that took place in the Philippines in January 2019. More than 300 attendees participated in the exchanges with the speakers and organisations in the Asian Institute of Management on January 17 2019. The Convergences Forum was followed by learning […]
